trophies.trophyDetail: Prove your mastery of the game, complete all game. Showcase your racing prowess and earn the title of Subway God, completing every trophy in the game.
Embark on your racing journey in the romantic streets of Paris. Navigate the twists and turns, overcome challenges, and cross the finish line to earn the Paris Explorer trophy.

Feel the raw power of the FM 2000 as you race through the enchanting Parisian streets for the first time. Embrace the speed and technology of this formidable vehicle to earn the FM 2000 Maiden Voyage trophy.
Master the intricacies of Paris with precision and skill. Maintain a perfect 100 mood rating throughout the race to showcase your expertise and earn the Paris Virtuoso trophy.
Conquer the challenges of London with unparalleled skill. Navigate the dynamic urban landscape flawlessly, maintaining a perfect 100 mood rating to earn the London Maestro trophy.
Unleash the power of the 08 Series on the bustling streets of London. Speed through the competition and cross the finish line with authority to claim the London 08 Series Dominator trophy.
Navigate the streets of Paris with the R62A, a vehicle of precision and speed. Conquer the challenges, showcase your racing finesse, and cross the finish line to earn the Paris R62A Conqueror trophy.
Demonstrate your strategic racing skills by skipping the first station. Navigate the altered route with precision, leaving competitors behind and earning the Station Skipper trophy.
Master the challenging streets of London and cross the finish line with triumph. Conquer the obstacles, showcase your racing prowess, and earn the London Conqueror trophy.
Immerse yourself in the neon lights of Tokyo and conquer the city's unique racing challenges. Finish the race with finesse, mastering the Tokyo streets to earn the Tokyo Finisher trophy.
Feel the exhilaration as you make your racing debut with the powerful S7. Speed through the Tokyo streets, mastering the controls, and earning the S7 Racing Debut trophy.
Unleash the full potential of the 08 Series for the first time. Feel the speed, power, and precision as you navigate the Tokyo tracks, securing victory and the 08 Series Racing Premiere trophy.
Ascend to the zenith of Tokyo racing by conquering with precision and speed. Get a perfect 100 mood rating, showcasing your mastery of the initial challenges and earning the Tokyo Zenith trophy.
Navigate the intricate streets of Tokyo without incurring any fines. Showcase your finesse and precision as you complete the race flawlessly, earning the Tokyo No-Fines Prodigy trophy.
Conquer the challenges of New York  without incurring any fines. Navigate the bustling streets of the iconic city with finesse, maintaining focus and achieving the New York No-Fines Virtuoso trophy.

Feel the triumph as you finish the race in Tokyo with the S7. Experience the perfect blend of speed and control as you navigate the vibrant and challenging Tokyo streets, earning the Tokyo S7 Triumph trophy.
Conquer the dynamic streets of New York and cross the finish line with finesse. Navigate the challenges of the cityscape, showcasing your racing prowess and earning the New York Finisher trophy.
Embark on an exhilarating racing experience by starting your first race with the powerful R62A. Feel the rush of its speed and precision, marking the beginning of your R62A Racing Debut.

Get the pinnacle of racing in the concrete jungle by conquering in New York. Navigate the challenging urban landscape with skill and precision, reach a perfect 100 mood rating and earning the New York Zenith trophy.
Conquer the challenges of Paris  without incurring any fines. Showcase your finesse as you navigate the streets of the City of Love, earning the Paris No-Fines Prodigy trophy.
Master the twists and turns of London without incurring any fines. Showcase your precision racing skills on the busy streets of London, earning the London No-Fines Virtuoso trophy.

Take on the iconic streets of New York with the FM2000. Feel the power of this formidable vehicle as you speed through the challenges and cross the finish line, earning the New York FM2000 Conqueror trophy.

Prove your mastery of the tracks as you complete all locations around the world. Conquer the challenges of Paris, London, Tokyo, and New York with various vehicles. Showcase your racing prowess and earn the title of Global Racing Legend, completing every race in the game.
